H0.text: In which children's TV series does Shaggy appear. Scooby-Doo

H1.text: In which children's TV series does Shaggy appear. Teen Titans

H2.text: In which children's TV series does Shaggy appear. Ed, Edd n Eddy

H3.text: In which children's TV series does Shaggy appear. Zentuo

A4.text: Norville 'Shaggy' Rogers is a fictional cartoon character and one of the main characters in the Scooby-Doo franchise.

A5.text: Shaggy later appears in the crossover episode 'Cartoon Feud' along with The Scooby Gang, where Control Freak forces them to compete in Family Feud with Matthew Lillard reprising the role of Shaggy.

A6.text: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated premiered on Cartoon Network on April 5, 2010.

A7.text: Shaggy & Scooby-Doo Get a Clue! ran for two seasons on The CW.
